page.title: 14RECREATION IN BETHERSDEN(1)
page.content: THERE IS SOMETHING FOR EVERYONE IN BETHERSDEN.THE TODDLER GROUP MEETS ONCE A WEEK WHEN THE TODDLERS PLAY TOGETHER AND MOTHERS ENJOY A CUP OF TEA AND A CHAT.CUBS,SCOUTS,BROWNIES AND GUIDES MEET WEEKLY DURING TERM TIME AND PLAY PACK/PATROL GAMES,LEARN SKILLS AND WORK FOR INTEREST BADGES.THE GUIDE MOVEMENT HAS THIS YEAR CELEBRATED THEIR 75TH ANNIVERSARY WHICH HAS BEEN MARKED BY VARIOUS FUNCTIONS.THE RECENTLY FORMED YOUTH GROUP RUN BY THE CHURCH FOR 11s TO 18s MEET FORTNIGHTLY.THE MOTHERS' UNION MEETS FOR CORPORATE COMMUNION MONTHLY AND OCCASIONALLY ENJOYS LUNCH TOGETHER WITH A SPEAKER.THEY GIVE FINANCIAL SUPPORT TO THE CHRISTIAN HOSPITAL IN VELORE,INDIA.THE ROYAL BRITISH LEGION ORGANISE THE POPPY DAY COLLECTIONS AND REMEMBRANCE DAY SERVICE.
